trans-unit.source: Represents information about a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Representerer informasjon om en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain identifying information for an initialized recognition engine using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: Du finner identifiserende for et initialisert recognition motoren ved hjelp av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>objektet eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The information returned in instances of RecognizerInfo obtained from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is determined by the settings in the **Speech Properties** member of the **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen returnert forekomster av RecognizerInfo hentet fra en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>bestemmes av innstillingene i den **egenskaper for tale** medlem av den **Kontrollpanel**.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: You can use instances of RecognizerInfo to construct a specific configuration of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke forekomster av RecognizerInfo for å lage en bestemt konfigurasjon av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29>konstruktør.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The static method <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> returns a list of all available <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurations as RecognizerInfo instances.
trans-unit.target: Den statiske metoden <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>returnerer en liste over alle tilgjengelige <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>konfigurasjoner som RecognizerInfo forekomster.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter tilleggsinformasjon en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> containing information about the configuration of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en forekomst av <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> som inneholder informasjon om konfigurasjon av en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture supported by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter kultur støttes av en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object can include the name of the culture, the associated language, the country/region, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt kan inneholde navnet på kulturen tilknyttede språket, land/region, kalenderen som skal brukes og hvordan til å formatere datoer og sortere strenger.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the culture supported by a given <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer informasjon om kultur støttes av en gitt <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter beskrivelsen av et <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that describes the configuration for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> som beskriver konfigurasjonen for en bestemt <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the `RecognizerInfo` object.
trans-unit.target: Disposes den `RecognizerInfo` objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter identifikatoren for en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The identifier returned by the Id property is the same as the token name of the recognition engine in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren som er returnert av Id-egenskapen er lik token navnet på recognition motoren i Windows-registret.

trans-unit.source: Returns the identifier for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer identifikatoren for en bestemt <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the friendly name of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter det egendefinerte navnet på en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Returns the friendly name for a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det egendefinerte navnet for en bestemt <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio formats supported by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter lyd formatene som støttes av en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of audio formats supported by a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en liste over lyd formater som støttes av en bestemt <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> forekomsten.
